title: Tesla Sued by California Agency for Alleged Racial Discrimination, Harassment
sub_head: California Department of Fair Employment and Housing says it acted after receiving hundreds of complaints from workers
body:
A California regulatory agency said it filed a lawsuit against Tesla Inc., alleging racial discrimination and harassment at the electric-vehicle maker.
The California Department of Fair Employment and Housing said it filed the complaint Wednesday in state court. The lawsuit targets alleged workplace issues at Tesla’s Fremont factory, the company’s principal U.S. car plant.
